content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Structure at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) used for storing coal
-  Chest (position x=41.5, y=-83.5) used for storing coal
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-81.5) used for transporting coal

### Furnace at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=0.0, y=0.0) used for smelting iron plate

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chest
-  Make sure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Ensure the agent has enough space in its inventory to extract items

### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate

### Errors when using inserter
-  Make sure the inserter has a source of items to pick up
-  Ensure the inserter has a valid drop position

### Errors when using furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate

### Errors when defining position
-  Make sure the position is defined correctly using the Position class
-  Ensure the position coordinates are valid

### NAMESPACE
*   Defined utility functions: 
    *   get_entity
    *   extract_item
    *   insert_item
*   Important variables: 
    *   coal_chest (type: Chest)
    *   iron_chest (type: Chest)
    *   drill (type: BurnerMiningDrill)
    *   inserter (type: BurnerInserter)
    *   furnace (type: Furnace)
